histogram.name: V8.ArrayBufferLargeAllocations
histogram.summary: Number of bytes requested in array buffer allocations greater than one megabyte.

histogram.name: V8.ArrayBufferNewSizeFailures
histogram.summary: Array buffer sizes for which V8 failed to allocate memory.

histogram.name: V8.CodeCacheRejectReason
histogram.summary: Reason code data has been rejected when attempting to deserialize.

histogram.name: V8.CodeCacheSizeRatio
histogram.summary: Cache size to source size ratio when caching compiled code.

histogram.name: V8.CollectSourcePositions
histogram.summary:
Time spent collecting source positions to generate stack traces.
Warning: This metric may include reports from clients with low-resolution clocks (i.e. on Windows, ref. |TimeTicks::IsHighResolution()|). Such reports will cause this metric to have an abnormal distribution. When considering revising this histogram, see UMA_HISTOGRAM_CUSTOM_MICROSECONDS_TIMES for the solution.

histogram.name: V8.CompileCacheableMicroSeconds
histogram.summary:
Time spent compiling a script that may be subject to caching.
Warning: This metric may include reports from clients with low-resolution clocks (i.e. on Windows, ref. |TimeTicks::IsHighResolution()|). Such reports will cause this metric to have an abnormal distribution. When considering revising this histogram, see UMA_HISTOGRAM_CUSTOM_MICROSECONDS_TIMES for the solution.

histogram.name: V8.CompileDeserializeMicroSeconds
histogram.summary:
Time spent deseriailzing code, used by V8 code caching.
Warning: This metric may include reports from clients with low-resolution clocks (i.e. on Windows, ref. |TimeTicks::IsHighResolution()|). Such reports will cause this metric to have an abnormal distribution. When considering revising this histogram, see UMA_HISTOGRAM_CUSTOM_MICROSECONDS_TIMES for the solution.

histogram.name: V8.CompileEvalMicroSeconds
histogram.summary:
Time spent in V8 compiler (full codegen) for eval.
Warning: This metric may include reports from clients with low-resolution clocks (i.e. on Windows, ref. |TimeTicks::IsHighResolution()|). Such reports will cause this metric to have an abnormal distribution. When considering revising this histogram, see UMA_HISTOGRAM_CUSTOM_MICROSECONDS_TIMES for the solution.

histogram.name: V8.CompileLazyMicroSeconds
histogram.summary:
Aggregated time spent compiling functions lazily during a single script execution.
Warning: This metric may include reports from clients with low-resolution clocks (i.e. on Windows, ref. |TimeTicks::IsHighResolution()|). Such reports will cause this metric to have an abnormal distribution. When considering revising this histogram, see UMA_HISTOGRAM_CUSTOM_MICROSECONDS_TIMES for the solution.

histogram.name: V8.CompileMicroSeconds
histogram.summary:
Time spent in V8 compiler (full codegen) excluding parser.
Warning: This metric may include reports from clients with low-resolution clocks (i.e. on Windows, ref. |TimeTicks::IsHighResolution()|). Such reports will cause this metric to have an abnormal distribution. When considering revising this histogram, see UMA_HISTOGRAM_CUSTOM_MICROSECONDS_TIMES for the solution.

histogram.name: V8.CompileScript.CacheBehaviour
histogram.summary: The cache behaviour of compiling a V8 script, including whether we produced or consumed a code cache, whether we hit V8's isolate's cache, and if we didn't use the code cache, the reason why not.

histogram.name: V8.CompileScriptMicroSeconds
histogram.summary:
Total time spent in compiling a script (incl. parsing/caching).
Warning: This metric may include reports from clients with low-resolution clocks (i.e. on Windows, ref. |TimeTicks::IsHighResolution()|). Such reports will cause this metric to have an abnormal distribution. When considering revising this histogram, see UMA_HISTOGRAM_CUSTOM_MICROSECONDS_TIMES for the solution.

histogram.name: V8.CompileScriptMicroSeconds.BackgroundThread
histogram.summary:
Total time spent in compiling a script (incl. parsing) on a background thread.
Warning: This metric may include reports from clients with low-resolution clocks (i.e. on Windows, ref. |TimeTicks::IsHighResolution()|). Such reports will cause this metric to have an abnormal distribution. When considering revising this histogram, see UMA_HISTOGRAM_CUSTOM_MICROSECONDS_TIMES for the solution.

histogram.name: V8.CompileScriptMicroSeconds.ConsumeCache
histogram.summary:
Total time spent in compiling a script when the 'compilation' is deserializing it from the code cache.
Warning: This metric may include reports from clients with low-resolution clocks (i.e. on Windows, ref. |TimeTicks::IsHighResolution()|). Such reports will cause this metric to have an abnormal distribution. When considering revising this histogram, see UMA_HISTOGRAM_CUSTOM_MICROSECONDS_TIMES for the solution.

histogram.name: V8.CompileScriptMicroSeconds.ConsumeCache.Failed
histogram.summary:
Total time spent in compiling a script (incl. parsing/caching) when the compilation tried to deserialize it from the code cache, but failed.
Warning: This metric may include reports from clients with low-resolution clocks (i.e. on Windows, ref. |TimeTicks::IsHighResolution()|). Such reports will cause this metric to have an abnormal distribution. When considering revising this histogram, see UMA_HISTOGRAM_CUSTOM_MICROSECONDS_TIMES for the solution.

histogram.name: V8.CompileScriptMicroSeconds.IsolateCacheHit
histogram.summary:
Total time spent in compiling a script (incl. parsing/caching) in the case where the V8 isolate's compilation cache is hit.
Warning: This metric may include reports from clients with low-resolution clocks (i.e. on Windows, ref. |TimeTicks::IsHighResolution()|). Such reports will cause this metric to have an abnormal distribution. When considering revising this histogram, see UMA_HISTOGRAM_CUSTOM_MICROSECONDS_TIMES for the solution.

histogram.name: V8.CompileScriptMicroSeconds.NoCache.CacheTooCold
histogram.summary:
Total time spent in compiling a script (incl. parsing) when the cache is too cold to use.
Warning: This metric may include reports from clients with low-resolution clocks (i.e. on Windows, ref. |TimeTicks::IsHighResolution()|). Such reports will cause this metric to have an abnormal distribution. When considering revising this histogram, see UMA_HISTOGRAM_CUSTOM_MICROSECONDS_TIMES for the solution.

histogram.name: V8.CompileScriptMicroSeconds.NoCache.InlineScript
histogram.summary:
Total time spent in compiling a script (incl. parsing) when the script is an inline script.
Warning: This metric may include reports from clients with low-resolution clocks (i.e. on Windows, ref. |TimeTicks::IsHighResolution()|). Such reports will cause this metric to have an abnormal distribution. When considering revising this histogram, see UMA_HISTOGRAM_CUSTOM_MICROSECONDS_TIMES for the solution.

histogram.name: V8.CompileScriptMicroSeconds.NoCache.Other
histogram.summary:
Total time spent in compiling a script (incl. parsing) when we do not want to cache it.
Warning: This metric may include reports from clients with low-resolution clocks (i.e. on Windows, ref. |TimeTicks::IsHighResolution()|). Such reports will cause this metric to have an abnormal distribution. When considering revising this histogram, see UMA_HISTOGRAM_CUSTOM_MICROSECONDS_TIMES for the solution.

histogram.name: V8.CompileScriptMicroSeconds.NoCache.ScriptTooSmall
histogram.summary:
Total time spent in compiling a script (incl. parsing) when the script is too small to be cached.
Warning: This metric may include reports from clients with low-resolution clocks (i.e. on Windows, ref. |TimeTicks::IsHighResolution()|). Such reports will cause this metric to have an abnormal distribution. When considering revising this histogram, see UMA_HISTOGRAM_CUSTOM_MICROSECONDS_TIMES for the solution.

histogram.name: V8.CompileScriptMicroSeconds.ProduceCache
histogram.summary:
Total time spent in compiling a script (incl. parsing) and serializing it for the code cache.
Warning: This metric may include reports from clients with low-resolution clocks (i.e. on Windows, ref. |TimeTicks::IsHighResolution()|). Such reports will cause this metric to have an abnormal distribution. When considering revising this histogram, see UMA_HISTOGRAM_CUSTOM_MICROSECONDS_TIMES for the solution.

histogram.name: V8.CompileScriptMicroSeconds.StreamingFinalization
histogram.summary:
Total time spent in finalizing a script that was streaming compiled.
Warning: This metric may include reports from clients with low-resolution clocks (i.e. on Windows, ref. |TimeTicks::IsHighResolution()|). Such reports will cause this metric to have an abnormal distribution. When considering revising this histogram, see UMA_HISTOGRAM_CUSTOM_MICROSECONDS_TIMES for the solution.

histogram.name: V8.CompileSerializeMicroSeconds
histogram.summary:
Time spent serializing code, used by V8 code caching.
Warning: This metric may include reports from clients with low-resolution clocks (i.e. on Windows, ref. |TimeTicks::IsHighResolution()|). Such reports will cause this metric to have an abnormal distribution. When considering revising this histogram, see UMA_HISTOGRAM_CUSTOM_MICROSECONDS_TIMES for the solution.

histogram.name: V8.DebugFeatureUsage
histogram.summary: Debugger feature used at least once per isolate, recorded on first use.

histogram.name: V8.ErrorsThrownPerContext
histogram.summary: The amount of JavaScript errors thrown by V8 per context. It does not count custom errors and ignores catched errors thrown by V8. This is collected after the context is detached.

histogram.name: V8.Execute
histogram.summary: Time spent in JavaScript Execution, including runtime calls, callbacks, and lazy compilation.

histogram.name: V8.GC.TimeToCollectionOnBackground
histogram.summary:
Time between requesting GC from background thread and actually starting collection on main thread. This is reported each time a background thread requests a GC.
Warning: This metric may include reports from clients with low-resolution clocks (i.e. on Windows, ref. |TimeTicks::IsHighResolution()|). Such reports will cause this metric to have an abnormal distribution. When considering revising this histogram, see UMA_HISTOGRAM_CUSTOM_MICROSECONDS_TIMES for the solution.

histogram.name: V8.GC.TimeToSafepoint
histogram.summary:
Time spent in stopping other threads to reach a safepoint. This is reported each time a safepoint is reached.
Warning: This metric may include reports from clients with low-resolution clocks (i.e. on Windows, ref. |TimeTicks::IsHighResolution()|). Such reports will cause this metric to have an abnormal distribution. When considering revising this histogram, see UMA_HISTOGRAM_CUSTOM_MICROSECONDS_TIMES for the solution.

histogram.name: V8.GCBackgroundMarking
histogram.summary: Time spent in background tasks doing marking in one GC cycle. It is recorded after each GC.

histogram.name: V8.GCBackgroundScavenger
histogram.summary: Time spent in background tasks doing scavenging in one GC cycle. It is recorded after each GC.

histogram.name: V8.GCBackgroundSweeping
histogram.summary: Time spent in background tasks doing sweeping in one GC cycle. It is recorded after each GC.

histogram.name: V8.GCCompactor
histogram.summary: Time spent in mark-sweep phase of GC.

histogram.name: V8.GCCompactorBackground
histogram.summary: Time spent in mark-sweep phase of GC in a background isolate.

histogram.name: V8.GCCompactorForeground
histogram.summary: Time spent in mark-sweep phase of GC in a foreground isolate.

histogram.name: V8.GCFinalizeMC
histogram.summary: Time spent in the final atomic pause of incremental latency-optimized Mark-Compact GC.

histogram.name: V8.GCFinalizeMC.Clear
histogram.summary: Time spent in the clearing phase of incremental latency-optimized Mark-Compact GC.

histogram.name: V8.GCFinalizeMC.Epilogue
histogram.summary: Time spent in the epilogue of incremental latency-optimized Mark-Compact GC.

histogram.name: V8.GCFinalizeMC.Evacuate
histogram.summary: Time spent in the evacuation phase of incremental latency-optimized Mark-Compact GC.

histogram.name: V8.GCFinalizeMC.Finish
histogram.summary: Time spent in the finish phase of incremental latency-optimized Mark-Compact GC.

histogram.name: V8.GCFinalizeMC.Mark
histogram.summary: Time spent in the marking phase of incremental latency-optimized Mark-Compact GC.

histogram.name: V8.GCFinalizeMC.Prologue
histogram.summary: Time spent in the prologue of incremental latency-optimized Mark-Compact GC.

histogram.name: V8.GCFinalizeMC.Sweep
histogram.summary: Time spent in the sweeping phase of incremental latency-optimized Mark-Compact GC.

histogram.name: V8.GCFinalizeMCBackground
histogram.summary: Time spent in the final atomic pause of incremental latency-optimized Mark-Compact GC in a background isolate.

histogram.name: V8.GCFinalizeMCForeground
histogram.summary: Time spent in the final atomic pause of incremental latency-optimized Mark-Compact GC in a foreground isolate.

histogram.name: V8.GCFinalizeMCReduceMemory
histogram.summary: Time spent in the final atomic pause of incremental memory-optimized Mark-Compact GC.

histogram.name: V8.GCFinalizeMCReduceMemoryBackground
histogram.summary: Time spent in the final atomic pause of incremental memory-optimized Mark-Compact GC in a background isolate.

histogram.name: V8.GCFinalizeMCReduceMemoryForeground
histogram.summary: Time spent in the final atomic pause of incremental memory-optimized Mark-Compact GC in a foreground isolate.

histogram.name: V8.GCIncrementalMarking
histogram.summary: Time spent doing incremental marking steps during GC.

histogram.name: V8.GCIncrementalMarkingFinalize
histogram.summary: Time spent in finalizing incremental marking.

histogram.name: V8.GCIncrementalMarkingReason
histogram.summary: Reason an incremental marking was started in V8.

histogram.name: V8.GCIncrementalMarkingStart
histogram.summary: Time spent in starting incremental marking.

histogram.name: V8.GCIncrementalMarkingSum
histogram.summary: The total time spent in incremental marking steps in one GC cycle. It is only recorded if the time is non-zero.

histogram.name: V8.GCMainThreadMarkingThroughput
histogram.summary: Marking throughput considering all durations of all marking phases on the main thread and marked bytes within one V8 garbage collection cycle. Reported once per garbage collection cycle. Only reported for platforms supporting high resolution clocks and when more than 1MB of live objects have been found.

histogram.name: V8.GCMarkCompactor
histogram.summary: Sum of all durations of individual phases within one V8 mark-compact garbage collection. Reported once per garbage collection.

histogram.name: V8.GCMarkCompactReason
histogram.summary: Reason a mark-compact garbage collection was started in V8.

histogram.name: V8.GCMarkingSum
histogram.summary: Sum of all durations of all marking phases (incremental and non-incremental) within one V8 garbage collection cycle. Reported once per garbage collection at the end.

histogram.name: V8.GCScavenger
histogram.summary: Time spent in scavenging phase of GC.

histogram.name: V8.GCScavenger.ScavengeMain
histogram.summary: Wall time spent in the main scavenging phase that copies over all reachable objects during a V8 scavenge.

histogram.name: V8.GCScavenger.ScavengeRoots
histogram.summary: Time spent in scavenging the roots during a V8 scavenge.

histogram.name: V8.GCScavengerBackground
histogram.summary: Time spent in scavenging phase of GC in a background isolate.

histogram.name: V8.GCScavengeReason
histogram.summary: Reason a scavenge garbage collection was started in V8.

histogram.name: V8.GCScavengerForeground
histogram.summary: Time spent in scavenging phase of GC in a foreground isolate.

histogram.name: V8.Initializer.LoadV8Snapshot.Result
histogram.summary: Results from snapshot loading.

histogram.name: V8.Initializer.OpenV8File.Result
histogram.summary: Results from opening V8 snapshot files.

histogram.name: V8.LiftoffBailoutReasons
histogram.summary: Liftoff (V8's baseline compiler for WebAssembly) bails out if it hits the first unsupported feature in a function. The function is recompiled with TurboFan then. This histogram records the bailout reason (or success) per WebAssembly function compilation in Liftoff.

histogram.name: V8.MemoryExternalFragmentationCodeSpace
histogram.summary: External memory fragmentation in the code space after each GC in percent.

histogram.name: V8.MemoryExternalFragmentationLoSpace
histogram.summary: External memory fragmentation in the large object space after each GC in percent.

histogram.name: V8.MemoryExternalFragmentationMapSpace
histogram.summary: External memory fragmentation in the map space after each GC in percent.

histogram.name: V8.MemoryExternalFragmentationOldSpace
histogram.summary: External memory fragmentation in the old space after each GC in percent.

histogram.name: V8.MemoryExternalFragmentationTotal
histogram.summary: Total external memory fragmentation after each GC in percent.

histogram.name: V8.MemoryHeapSampleCodeSpaceCommitted
histogram.summary: The size of committed memory in the code space after each GC in KB.

histogram.name: V8.MemoryHeapSampleMapSpaceCommitted
histogram.summary: The size of committed memory in the map space after each GC in KB.

histogram.name: V8.MemoryHeapSampleMaximumCommitted
histogram.summary: The maximum size of committed memory used by V8 after each GC in KB.

histogram.name: V8.MemoryHeapSampleTotalCommitted
histogram.summary: The total size of committed memory used by V8 after each GC in KB.

histogram.name: V8.MemoryHeapSampleTotalUsed
histogram.summary: The total size of live memory used by V8 after each GC in KB.

histogram.name: V8.RegExpBacktracks
histogram.summary: The number of backtracks performed in a single regexp execution.

histogram.name: V8.SharedArrayAllocationSizes
histogram.summary: Number of megabytes requested in shared array buffer allocations.

histogram.name: V8.StopTheWorld
histogram.obsolete: Removed 02/2021. Renamed to V8.GC.TimeToSafepoint due to switch to microseconds.
histogram.summary: Time spent in stopping other threads before performing GC.

histogram.name: V8.TimeToCollection
histogram.obsolete: Removed 02/2021. Renamed to V8.GC.TimeToCollectionBackground due to switch to microseconds.
histogram.summary: Time between requesting GC from background thread and actually starting collection on main thread.

histogram.name: V8.TurboFan1KTicks
histogram.summary:
Number of ticks (in 1000s of ticks) from starting optimizing to installing the code object. Recorded on each regular optimization of a function.
Similar to V8.TurboFanOptimizeTotalTime, but instead of counting time, we count a deterministic number of ticks sprinkled throughout the Turbofan compiler.

histogram.name: V8.TurboFanOptimizeConcurrentTotalTime
histogram.summary:
Total time from starting optimizing to installing the code object. Recorded on each regular, concurrent optimization of a function.
This histogram only records metrics on machines with high-resolution clocks.

histogram.name: V8.TurboFanOptimizeExecute
histogram.summary:
Time spent in the execution phase of TurboFan optimization. Recorded on each regular optimization of a function.
This histogram only records metrics on machines with high-resolution clocks.

histogram.name: V8.TurboFanOptimizeFinalize
histogram.summary:
Time spent in the finalization phase of TurboFan optimization. Recorded on each regular optimization of a function.
This histogram only records metrics on machines with high-resolution clocks.

histogram.name: V8.TurboFanOptimizeForOnStackReplacementExecute
histogram.summary:
Time spent in the execution phase of TurboFan optimization for On Stack Replacement (OSR). Recorded on each optimization for on-stack replacement of a function.
This histogram only records metrics on machines with high-resolution clocks.

histogram.name: V8.TurboFanOptimizeForOnStackReplacementFinalize
histogram.summary:
Time spent in the finalization phase of TurboFan optimization for On Stack Replacement (OSR). Recorded on each optimization for on-stack replacement of a function.
This histogram only records metrics on machines with high-resolution clocks.

histogram.name: V8.TurboFanOptimizeForOnStackReplacementPrepare
histogram.summary:
Time spent in the preparation phase of TurboFan optimization for On Stack Replacement (OSR). Recorded on each optimization for on-stack replacement of a function.
This histogram only records metrics on machines with high-resolution clocks.

histogram.name: V8.TurboFanOptimizeForOnStackReplacementTotalTime
histogram.summary:
Total time from starting optimizing for On Stack Replacement (OSR) to installing the code object. Recorded on each optimization for on-stack replacement of a function.
This histogram only records metrics on machines with high-resolution clocks.

histogram.name: V8.TurboFanOptimizeNonConcurrentTotalTime
histogram.summary:
Total time from starting optimizing to installing the code object. Recorded on each regular, non-concurrent optimization of a function.
This histogram only records metrics on machines with high-resolution clocks.

histogram.name: V8.TurboFanOptimizePrepare
histogram.summary:
Time spent in the preparation phase of TurboFan optimization. Recorded on each regular optimization of a function.
This histogram only records metrics on machines with high-resolution clocks.

histogram.name: V8.TurboFanOptimizeTotalBackground
histogram.summary:
Total time spent on a background thread during TurboFan optimization. Recorded on each regular optimization of a function.
This histogram only records metrics on machines with high-resolution clocks.

histogram.name: V8.TurboFanOptimizeTotalForeground
histogram.summary:
Total time spent on the main thread during TurboFan optimization. Recorded on each regular optimization of a function.
This histogram only records metrics on machines with high-resolution clocks.

histogram.name: V8.TurboFanOptimizeTotalTime
histogram.summary:
Total time from starting optimizing to installing the code object. Recorded on each regular optimization of a function.
This histogram only records metrics on machines with high-resolution clocks.

histogram.name: V8.WasmAddressSpaceUsageMiB
histogram.summary: The total amount of address space reserved by the backing stores of all live WebAssembly.Memory backing stores in MiB. Recorded on each memory reservation.

histogram.name: V8.WasmCatchCount
histogram.summary: Number of exceptions caught so far in an isolate, recorded on each caught exception.

histogram.name: V8.WasmCompileFunctionMicroSeconds
histogram.summary:
Time to compile a WebAssembly function. Recorded on each compilation of a single function, either synchronous, asynchronous, or lazily.
Warning: This metric may include reports from clients with low-resolution clocks (i.e. on Windows, ref. |TimeTicks::IsHighResolution()|). Such reports will cause this metric to have an abnormal distribution. When considering revising this histogram, see UMA_HISTOGRAM_CUSTOM_MICROSECONDS_TIMES for the solution.

histogram.name: V8.WasmCompileFunctionPeakMemoryBytes
histogram.summary: Peak memory used to compile a WebAssembly function. Recorded for each TurboFan compilation of a WebAssembly function.

histogram.name: V8.WasmCompileModuleAsyncMicroSeconds
histogram.summary: Time to asynchronously compile a WebAssembly module (using the 'WebAssembly.compile' API). Recorded on each asynchronous WebAssembly compilation, but only if a high-resolution clock is available.

histogram.name: V8.WasmCompileModuleMicroSeconds
histogram.summary:
Time to compile a WebAssembly module. Recorded on each synchronous WebAssembly compilation.
Warning: This metric may include reports from clients with low-resolution clocks (i.e. on Windows, ref. |TimeTicks::IsHighResolution()|). Such reports will cause this metric to have an abnormal distribution. When considering revising this histogram, see UMA_HISTOGRAM_CUSTOM_MICROSECONDS_TIMES for the solution.

histogram.name: V8.WasmCompileModuleStreamingMicroSeconds
histogram.summary: Time to asynchronously compile a WebAssembly module using streaming compilation (via the 'WebAssembly.compileStreaming' API). Recorded on each streaming WebAssembly compilation, but only if a high-resolution clock is available. Note that compilation speed is often limited by the network speed, which is also reflected in this metric.

histogram.name: V8.WasmFinishModuleStreamingMicroSeconds
histogram.summary: Time to asynchronously compile or deserialize a WebAssembly module during streaming compilation (via the 'WebAssembly.compileStreaming' API). Recorded on each streaming WebAssembly compilation or deserialization from the cache, but only if a high-resolution clock is available. Note that compilation speed is often limited by the network speed, which is also reflected in this metric.

histogram.name: V8.WasmFunctionSizeBytes
histogram.summary: Size of a WebAssembly function in bytes. Recorded on each compilation of a single function, either synchronous, asynchronous, or lazily.

histogram.name: V8.WasmFunctionsPerModule
histogram.summary: Function count per WebAssembly module. Recorded for each WebAssembly module which is decoded for validation, compilation, or deserialization.

histogram.name: V8.WasmInstantiateModuleMicroSeconds
histogram.summary:
Time to instantiate a WebAssembly module. Recorded on each instantiation of a WebAssembly module.
Warning: This metric may include reports from clients with low-resolution clocks (i.e. on Windows, ref. |TimeTicks::IsHighResolution()|). Such reports will cause this metric to have an abnormal distribution. When considering revising this histogram, see UMA_HISTOGRAM_CUSTOM_MICROSECONDS_TIMES for the solution.

histogram.name: V8.WasmMaxMemPagesCount
histogram.summary: Number of 64KiB pages a WebAssembly module declares as its maximum requirement. Recorded on each instantiation of a WebAssembly module.

histogram.name: V8.WasmMemoryAllocationResult
histogram.summary: The result of attempts to allocate WebAssembly.Memory buffers. Recorded on each attempt to allocate a WebAssembly.Memory buffer.

histogram.name: V8.WasmMemoryProtectionKeysSupport
histogram.summary:
Whether the system supports memory protection keys in userspace (MPK / PKU / PKEY). This is determined once per process and recorded once per isolate during isolate creation (startup).
As we use a Linux-specific API for PKUs, this value is only recorded on 64-bit Linux machines.

histogram.name: V8.WasmMinMemPagesCount
histogram.summary: Number of 64KiB pages a WebAssembly module declares as its minimum requirement. Recorded on each instantiation of a WebAssembly module.

histogram.name: V8.WasmModuleCodeSizeBaselineMiB
histogram.summary: The amount of generated code in MiB for one WebAssembly module. Recorded when baseline compilation finished.

histogram.name: V8.WasmModuleCodeSizeMiB
histogram.summary: The amount of committed code space in MiB used by individual WebAssembly modules. Recorded for each live module after each full GC.

histogram.name: V8.WasmModuleCodeSizePercentFreed
histogram.summary: The percentage of WebAssembly code freed by garbage collection (ratio of total freed code to total generated code so far). Recorded for each live module after each full GC.

histogram.name: V8.WasmModuleCodeSizeTopTierMiB
histogram.summary: The amount of generated code in MiB for one WebAssembly module. Recorded when top-tier compilation finished.

histogram.name: V8.WasmModuleNumberOfCodeGCsTriggered
histogram.summary: Number of code GCs triggered per WebAssembly module. Recorded after each code GC.

histogram.name: V8.WasmModuleNumberOfCodeSpaces
histogram.summary: The number of code spaces (i.e. individual reservations) of a WebAssembly module. Recorded on every code space allocation.

histogram.name: V8.WasmModuleSizeBytes
histogram.summary: Size of the wire bytes of a WebAssembly module. Recorded for each WebAssembly module which is decoded for validation, compilation, or deserialization.

histogram.name: V8.WasmModulesPerEngine
histogram.summary: Number of WebAssembly native modules live in a Wasm engine (typically per process). Recorded whenever a new native module is created.

histogram.name: V8.WasmModulesPerIsolate
histogram.summary: Number of WebAssembly native modules live in an isolate. Recorded whenever a new native module is created.

histogram.name: V8.WasmReThrowCount
histogram.summary: Number of exceptions rethrown so far in an isolate, recorded on each rethrown exception.

histogram.name: V8.WasmThrowCount
histogram.summary: Number of exceptions thrown so far in an isolate, recorded on each thrown exception.

histogram.name: V8.WasmTierUpModuleMicroSeconds
histogram.summary: Time to tier-up a WebAssembly module, i.e. the time between baseline compilation finishes and top-tier compilation finishes. Recorded whenever an asynchronously compiled module finishes top-tier compilation, but only if a high-resolution clock is available.

histogram.name: V8.WasmTimeBetweenCatchMilliseconds
histogram.summary: Time since the last time an exception was caught in WebAssembly, recorded when the next exception is caught (per isolate).

histogram.name: V8.WasmTimeBetweenRethrowsMilliseconds
histogram.summary: Time since the last time an exception was rethrown in WebAssembly, recorded when the next exception is rethrown (per isolate).

histogram.name: V8.WasmTimeBetweenThrowsMilliseconds
histogram.summary: Time since the last time an exception was thrown in WebAssembly, recorded when the next exception is thrown (per isolate).
